s1.title: Oyoaha Decorator
s1.p: The Oyoaha look and feel for Swing has been adapted to become a pluggable decorator. The control panel for the decorator allows a number of configurations for appearance. Some are merely themes from Metal Look and Feel, some use Oyoaha's '.otm' scheme for pluggable looks. One, anidaisy, shows an alpha channel look and feel, with fairly impressive animation buttons.
There is still plenty to do for Oyoaha:

ol.li: Use Radio buttons in the configration tool, rather than check boxes
